H

Hall - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model
The Hall is a third of the School.
Hall() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Hall
Hall constructor.
handleAssistantCardChoice(Message) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Allows the current player to play the chosen Assistant Card, if it is playable: in the case it is, all the other players will be notified; otherwise, the current player will be asked to choose another one.
handleCharacterCardChoice(Message) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameControllerExpertMode
Allows the current player to play a Character Card, if possible.
handleClientConnection() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.SocketClientHandler
Reads messages from the associated client after deserializing the message; if it is a login request, it adds the SocketClient to the client list, otherwise it just sends the message to the SocketServer -> Server -> GameController.
handleCloudChoice(Message) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Handles the current player's cloud choice at the end of their Action Phase, allowing them to empty one.
handleMotherNature(Message) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Handles Mother Nature's movement, as desired by the current player.
handleStudentMovement(Message) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Handles the movement of a student, as desired by the current player.
hashCode() - Method in record class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Student
Returns a hash code value for this object.
hasMotherNatureMoved() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Checks if Mother Nature has already been moved by the current player (during their Action Phase).
hasVetoTile() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Island
Checks if the island has a veto tile on itself.
Healer - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.charactercards
Allows the player to put a veto tile on a chosen island: this means that if Mother Nature reaches an island with such a tile, no conquering check method will be called.
Healer() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.charactercards.Healer
Character Card constructor.
